name: 2022 12th International Conference on Economics, Trade and Development
content: International Journal Publications: For papers submitted for the ICETD 2022, we offer publications as following: 1\. International Journal of Trade, Economics and Finance (IJTEF) ISSN: 2010-023X (Print) Frequency: Bimonthly DOI: 10.18178/IJTEF Indexing: ProQuest, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library, EBSCO, etc. Template: http://www.ijtef.org/IJTEF\_template.doc 2\. Journal of Economics, Business and Management (JOEBM) ISSN: 2301-3567 Frequency: Quarterly DOI: 10.18178/JOEBM Indexing Electronic Journals Library, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, MESLibrary, Google Scholar, and Crossref. Template: http://www.joebm.com/JOEBM\_template.doc
